info.description: Simple server in order to create and mantain CGA Survey
info.title: CGA Survey

tags.name: AdminApp
tags.description: A set of APIs designed for administrate the projects

tags.name: SurveyApp
tags.description: A set of APIs designed to fill the surveys

get.summary: Log-in
get.description: Allow the user to log into the system using Google auth

get.summary: Log-out
get.description: Allow the user to log out and destroy the session

post.description: Performed by a user when he wants to create a new project

parameters.name: project
parameters.description: Project object that needs to be added

creation_date.description: Date and time in which the project has been created

delete.description: Performed by the user in order to delete the Project from the system
